Simply add the plugin to the build section of your top-level POM as following.
<build> <plugins> ... <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>flatten-maven-plugin</artifactId> <!--<version>1.0</version>--> <configuration> </configuration> <executions> <execution> <id>flatten</id> <phase>process-resources</phase> <goals> <goal>flatten</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
